$eref.description: The coded value domain includes both the actual value that is stored in a database and a description of what the code value means.
$eref.title: codedValue

___codedValues.description: A set of valid values with unique names.

___type.description: String value representing the domain type.

$eref.description: This domain applies to domains on subtypes. It implies that the domain for a field at the subtype level is the same as the domain for the field at the layer level.
$eref.title: inheritedDomain

___type.description: String value representing the domain type.

$eref.description: Range domain specifies a range of valid values for a field
$eref.title: rangeDomain

___type.description: String value representing the domain type.

___range.description: The first element is the minValue and the second element is the maxValue.

description: Domains specify the set of valid values for a field. The links below are the available domains.
title: domain
